title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Transformer Model-Based Personalized Mathematics Information Technology Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and foundational programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized mathematical problem-solving algorithms with 85% accuracy.
Learners improve learning efficiency by over 20% using a transformer model-based learning path recommendation system.
Learners can present results of improved individual mathematical thinking skills through project-based assessment using three or more metrics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
